Body: My BSNL penta IS709C tablet got locked after too many unlock attempts. After that I tried to hard reset by pressing BACK + HOME + MENU buttons together with the power button but in vain. Tablet present condition:1) USB debugging off, so no adb commands.  2) wifi is off. 3) No    associated google account.Please help me restore the tablet or suggest me how can I hard reset it.
Title: bsnl is709c android tablet is not booting up

history.Text: My **BSNL penta IS709C** tablet got looked after too unlock attempt. After that I tried hard reset by pressing BACK + HOME + MENU buttons together with the power button.![BSNL IS709C][1]Don't know what went wrong but tablet got stuck on the following screen. Please help me to restore the tablet.![enter image description here][2]  [1]: http://i.stack.imgur.com/lMTOU.jpg  [2]: http://i.stack.imgur.com/CRgew.jpg
